title: The Devil
overview: Rajashekar (Chief Minister of Karnataka) is framed, so his secretary recruits Krishna, a kindhearted lookalike, to impersonate the violent heir Dhanush. When the real Dhanush returns, both men clash for political power and Rukminiâ€™s love. Krishna must protect Rukmini from Dhanush while also rising as a leader the people trust.
